name.ja: Block Blast アンブロック

short.ar: العب Block Blast - لعبة الألغاز المدمنة لمطابقة الكتل!
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Block Blast - the addictive block-matching puzzle game!
short.de: Spiele Block Blast - das süchtig machende Block-Matching-Puzzlespiel!
short.es: ¡Juega Block Blast - el adictivo juego de puzzle de combinación de bloques!
short.fr: Jouez à Block Blast - le jeu de puzzle addictif d'assemblage de blocs !
short.it: Gioca a Block Blast - l'avvincente puzzle game di abbinamento blocchi!
short.ja: Block Blast をプレイ - 中毒性のあるブロックマッチングパズルゲーム！
short.ko: Block Blast 플레이 - 중독성 있는 블록 매칭 퍼즐 게임!
short.pt_BR: Jogue Block Blast - o viciante jogo de quebra-cabeça de combinar blocos!
short.ru: Играйте в Block Blast - захватывающую головоломку с блоками!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block Blast Online Enhanced Experience

Transform your Block Blast gameplay on block-blast-online.com with this essential extension. This enhancement brings a more refined experience to the classic color-matching puzzle game you love.

Why Install:
- Optimized display for better block visibility and color recognition
- Enhanced score tracking interface
- Improved preview of upcoming blocks
- Clearer visibility of special blocks and power-ups
- Smooth control response for precise block placement

Perfect for both casual players and puzzle enthusiasts, this extension helps you:
- Create longer combo chains for higher scores
- Better visualize strategic block placements
- Track your progress with an enhanced interface
- Spot special items like bombs and power-ups more easily

Designed to work seamlessly with block-blast-online.com while maintaining the core gameplay mechanics that make Block Blast engaging and challenging.
